document_data.mainbody:
Carrackus was a male scrag and a pirate on the Sword Coast under the command of Pinochet.
Carrackus was present in 1356 DR when the Sea Sprite, sailed by Captain Deudermont and the Companions of the Hall, defeated Pinochets fleet, but Carrackus managed to escape.
Carrackus later became captain of his own pirate ship. However, in 1364 DR, he was pursued by the Sea Sprite and defeated by Drizzt DoUrden and Guenhwyvar. He was torn to pieces and the Sea Sprites crew fished his remains out of the sea so they could be burned and permanently destroyed
